name: exShut
short_description:
Windows extended Shutdown scheduler
Version: 0.3.0.2
Licence: GNU/GPLv3
Author: Sebastien LASCOURS

Description:
Allow you to schedule the following actions through user-friendly graphic interface : 
- Shutdown
- Restart
- Log off
- Lock your session
- Hibernate
- Go to "Sleep mode"
- Send a message

The lack of "shutdown -i" to lock the session or go into 'Sleep Mode' made me wrote this tiny tool.

Functionalities:
- 32 & 64 bits windows platforms supported
- Stay in the notification zone
- Cancel the requested operation

Requirements:
- Microsfot .NET Framework 2.0
